footer.text: Character Guide • Build: Diluc | Update Date: 02/27/2023 | Editor: Samantha#9907

fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Wolf's Gravestone__
ATK% statstick that universally performs well on most Claymore characters.
__Beacon of the Reed Sea__
Synergizes very well with his second constellation, gaining ATK% when he is hit, and provides CRIT Rate as a substat.

fields.name: Replacement Weapon(s):
fields.value: Redhorn Stonethresher, Serpent Spine, The Unforged, Rainslasher, Luxurious Sea-Lord, Mailed Flower

fields.name: Main Stats Priority
fields.value: <sands> ATK% or Elemental Mastery |<goblet>  Pyro DMG Bonus |<circlet>  CRIT DMG or CRIT Rate

fields.name: Talent Priority
fields.value:
**1)** Elemental Skill: Searing Onslaught
**2)** Normal Attack: Tempered Sword
**3)** Elemental Burst: Dawn
